mapper.select:
select
from vchannelschedule where vchannelid = '${vchannelid}' order by starttime
mapper.delete:
delete from vchannelschedule where vchannelid = '${vchannelid}'
and playmode = '${playmode}'
and playdate = '${playdate}'
and starttime = '${starttime}'
